steps.conclusion: None. All constraints are followed: Portuguese output, titles ≤5 words without levels or joiners, appropriate english_title translations, is_language_course=false for all, and tabler- prefixed icons.
None. Titles look like real single-topic courses; translations are accurate; descriptions are in Portuguese.

Could include an additional broad canonical option like "Ciência da Computação" or "Engenharia de Software" to round out foundations. Consider using a more generic icon (e.g., tabler-brackets) instead of a brand icon for "Linguagens de Programação" for consistency.
